Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it does not handle the case when the length of the array is 0. It tries to create a new array of size nums.length-1 which will be -1 when the length of the array is 0, causing an exception. Also, the buggy code does not handle the case when the length of the array is greater than 2. It tries to access the second element of the array without checking if it exists. Generated Test cases 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 (6/8) should pass the buggy code.
